Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add resort hierarchy UI redesign plan

Reorganizes navigation from flat park list to 4-level hierarchy:
Resort → Category \(parks/hotels/other\) → Venue → Menu Items.
Includes themed visual system, data mapping approach, and route structure.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
